channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is the Citi / AAdvantage Executive World Elite Mastercard worth it?
item.description: We analyze travel perks on the Citi / AAdvantage Executive card when paying the hefty $595 annual fee. Is it worth it for American Airlines loyalists?

item.title: Maine, Nova Scotia and the Rockies: United dials up summer travel in 14-route expansion
item.description: United Airlines announced a 14-route expansion that includes nine new summer seasonal routes to popular U.S. and Canada vacation spots.

item.title: Hilton just launched a new brand focused on apartment-style stays
item.description: Hilton is embracing homey vibes in 2026, introducing a new category of apartment-style accommodations in cities across the country that offers a new w...

item.title: Turboprops are back: Are these new JSX planes better than a jet?
item.description: Boutique air carrier JSX is flying new ATR turboprops from Santa Monica, California, to Las Vegas and Scottsdale, Arizona.

item.title: The best credit card welcome bonuses of January 2026
item.description: Make sure these elevated and limited-time credit card offers are on your radar this month, or you could end up missing out.
